attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0872502162. This BMW 218i Gran Coupe Auto is an absolute pleasure to drive. The leather wrapped steering wheel feels extremely premium and the multi-information display allows for easy operations as you navigate your way to your destinations and listen to your favorite tunes. 
Manufacturers' claimed fuel consumption figures averages at 5.9 litres per 100km. The 1.5 litre bi-turbo engine produces 103 kW of power and 220 Nm of torque which results in acceleration going from 0-100 km in just 8.7 seconds. It reaches a top speed of 213 km/h.  
This vehicle provides luxury and comfort. 

ALL PRE-OWNED VEHICLES UNDERGO A STRINGENT AA MULTI-POINT CHECK AND AA ROADWORTHY BEFORE DELIVERY. WE DELIVER COUNTRYWIDE AND IT GETS EVEN BETTER, WE COME TO YOU. FINANCE AVAILABLE AND A TEST DRIVE IS A MUST. PRICE EXCLUDES LICENSE REGISTRATION, ADMINISTRATION, DELIVERY, AND ON THE ROAD FEES.

*ERRORS AND OMISSIONS EXCEPTED

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0872502162. This Ford EcoSport is an ideal compact SUV to suit your needs. It is a great compact SUV that is pleasing to drive and it is also quite fuel efficient. The manufacturers' claimed fuel consumption figures averages at 6.4 litres per 100 km. 
This would be an ideal vehicle for you and your family as it is spacious and provides comfort and it is reliable. It has less than 47 000 km's on the clock. 
It feels comfortable on the road and it is ideal for commuting to work. It is also quite good for dropping the kids off at school.

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0872502162. This 2004 Mercedes-Benz CLK 320 Coupe Auto will surprise you with its modern day features. It may be old but it is actually gold! It was a vehicle that was ahead of its time in terms of features. The build quality is solid. The leathers seats are extremely comfortable and the glossy wood finishes add a touch of class similar to those found in luxury yachts. The ride quality of this vehicle is exceptional. 
Sold as is AKA "Voetstoets".
